tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following organisms probably uses PEP carboxylase to capture carbon dioxide and keep stomata closed during the day?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Sugar cane
X) Aloe vera
Y) Corn
Z) Sorghum
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following cell types is responsible for generating the extracellular matrix?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Macrophages
X) Monocytes
Y) Megakaryocytes
Z) Fibroblasts
